Bling Bling is a filmic diary by three women from Berlin and an authentic inside into the heart of L.A.’s Hip Hop Scene. 

Neelesha Barthel, Heike Woosey and Janna Ji Wonders stroll through clubs, living rooms and music studios in West Hollywood, South Central and Inglewood. A film about Gangster-Rap, Crack, the music industry, women and Hip Hop and Hip Hop between art and commerce with Boo-Yaa T.R.I.B.E., Black Eyed Peas, Kim Hill, Medusa, Tré (ex-Pharcyde), Snoop Dogg, Lonzo (World Class Wreckin´Cru) and many more.
